description:
Chapter 4 - A Moveable Feast --
In this forth installment of a 7-part episodic series inspired by the literary works of Ernest Hemingway, we see Master Doc and Paige are in fancy dress having a nice dinner. We learn that Master Doc is disappointed in Paige for her naughty behavior with Ami. He was planning on teaching her to be a FemDom and that she really needs to prove that sheâ€™s ready and can handle the responsibility. In order to do so, he orders her to help punish Ami. Master Doc leads the action, first demonstrating on Ami a proper hard spanking. This leads into a host of other punishments as well as sex on the table.
title: Turning The Paige: Chapter Four
